name: Firework Night
description:
So many of us have missed the 5th November celebrations. So I decided to make a small project.

-Click to launch a firework, press escape to exit. 

-Put on your headphones and play some music in the background, fireworks go boom loud.

Remember remember the fifth of November.

-Jack

Created with Unreal Engine.

Fireworks created by Tom Shannon LLC and provided by Epic Games.
